Text.Page:
Your orders are to curb the Red Lash pirates and beasts along the Jagged Coast in front of the Pirate Grotto.

Aim for {@LinkCreature:11#4001#Red Lash crushers}, {@LinkCreature:11#4002#rovers}, and {@LinkCreature:11#4003#freebooters}, as well as {@LinkCreature:11#4004#spiketail kamaras}.

Report to Rexana when mission is complete.

Well done, . Keep up the good work.

Victory for Valkyon!
The federation will reward you if you bring back tokens.
